shadow.name: EXPECTATION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Increase, expressing through expectation

gift.name: DETACHMENT
gift.description: The gift frequency of Increase, expressing through detachment

siddhi.name: CELEBRATION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Increase, expressing through celebration

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 42 shadow frequency. The expectation you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural detachment. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from expectation to detachment.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your sacral. Notice the sensation of expectation.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 42 consciously for 7 days, the expectation pattern will shift toward detachment.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 42 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from expectation toward detachment
